# Jsonlite

```{r}
pacman::p_load(jsonlite)
```

```{r}
# jsonlite is already loaded

# Challenge 1
json1 <- '[[1, 2], [3, 4]]'
fromJSON(json1)


```

```{r}
# Challenge 2
json2 <- '[{"a": 1, "b": 2}, {"a": 3, "b": 4},  {"a": 5, "b": 6}]'
fromJSON(json2)
```
